description: This Python source file defines a script for creating an AI-powered Thai cooking assistant agent that integrates a PDF knowledge base, web search tools, and a conversational model. It includes setup for knowledge base loading, storage, and agent configuration, as well as a command-line interface for interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A conversational agent that integrates knowledge base, web search, and language model to assist with Thai cooking questions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a PDF-based knowledge base of Thai recipes.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: A class for storing agent sessions and data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A class providing web search capabilities via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database class used for storing and searching knowledge base embeddings.

methods.name: recipe_agent
methods.description: Main function to initialize and run the Thai cooking assistant agent, handling session management and CLI interaction.
